Class Flock

java.lang.Object
Flock
public class Flock
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Flock class, the point of this class is to handle all boid objects as a flock these are grouped together boids in an array list Documentation Statement: I received some help from Dr. Hadfield who informed me that I needed to use a boolean to ensure that I was pausing.
Author:
C22Andrew.Lee

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Flock​(java.awt.Color color, int size, int boids, double cRadius, double aRadius, double sRadius, double dRadius, double flockSpeed)
    Flock() - constructor for the flock sets variables and loads the arrayList

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void accumalate()
    accumulate() - loops through the flock and does cohesion, alignment and separation if necessary combines all values using the proper weights .4 for velocity, .2 for everything else and then sets the old velocity values to this new velocity value
    private Vector330 alignment​(Boid checking)
    alignment() - acts to ensure that all the boids are going in the correct direction by adding all vectors up.
    private Vector330 cohesion​(Boid checking)
    cohesion() - brings the boids closer together by acting as a gravity of sort, meet at the average.
    void disperse​(double x, double y)
    disperse() - takes the location of the mouse click and has the nearby boids avoid by moving away to get radius away from epicenter
    void drawFlock​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
    drawFlock() - draws the flock
    void moveFlock​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
    moveFlock() - moves the flock
    void randomize()
    randomize() - randomizes all of the values including the location and the velocities
    private Vector330 separation​(Boid checking)
    separation() - brings the boids farther apart by acting as anti gravity, if they are close then go opposite direction.
    void setScales​(double vScale, double cScale, double aScale, double sScale)
    setScales() - sets the weights sets all the weights that are being used from the GUI
    static void setScreenHeight​(int height)
    setScreenHeight() - sets the height of the screen
    static void setScreenWidth​(int width)
    setScreenWidth() - sets the width of the screen

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Flock

      public Flock​(java.awt.Color color, int size, int boids, double cRadius, double aRadius, double sRadius, double dRadius, double flockSpeed)
      Flock() - constructor for the flock sets variables and loads the arrayList
      Parameters:
      color - - the color to make flock
      size - - the size of each boid
      boids - - number of boids
      cRadius - - radius of cohesion
      aRadius - - radius of alignment
      sRadius - - radius of separation
      dRadius - - radius of dispersion
      flockSpeed - - speed of the flock

  • Method Details

      drawFlock() - draws the flock
      Parameters:

      moveFlock() - moves the flock
      Parameters:

      setScreenWidth() - sets the width of the screen

    • cohesion

      private Vector330 cohesion​(Boid checking)
      cohesion() - brings the boids closer together by acting as a gravity of sort, meet at the average. Loops through the flock and checks each Boid against each other.
      Parameters:
      checking - - the Boid that is going to be checked against
      Returns:
      ret - the average computed as a unit vector

    • alignment

      private Vector330 alignment​(Boid checking)
      alignment() - acts to ensure that all the boids are going in the correct direction by adding all vectors up. Loops through the flock and checks each Boid against each other.
      Parameters:
      checking - - the Boid that is going to be checked against
      Returns:
      ret - the total vectors added up and then found as unit vector

    • separation

      private Vector330 separation​(Boid checking)
      separation() - brings the boids farther apart by acting as anti gravity, if they are close then go opposite direction. Loops through the flock and checks each Boid against each other.
      Parameters:
      checking - - the Boid that is going to be checked against
      Returns:
      ret - the direction that Boid should move to escape

    • disperse

      public void disperse​(double x, double y)
      disperse() - takes the location of the mouse click and has the nearby boids avoid by moving away to get radius away from epicenter
      Parameters:
      x - - X location of the mouse
      y - - Y location of the mouse

    • accumalate

      public void accumalate()
      accumulate() - loops through the flock and does cohesion, alignment and separation if necessary combines all values using the proper weights .4 for velocity, .2 for everything else and then sets the old velocity values to this new velocity value

    • setScales

      public void setScales​(double vScale, double cScale, double aScale, double sScale)
      setScales() - sets the weights sets all the weights that are being used from the GUI
      Parameters:
      vScale - - velocity weight
      aScale - - alignment scale
      cScale - - cohesion scale
      sScale - - separation scale

    • randomize

      public void randomize()
      randomize() - randomizes all of the values including the location and the velocities
